scripts.updateZeeguuReact: git submodule update --remote --merge && (cd src/zeeguu-react/ && npm install)
scripts.build: npm-run-all buildUnix:* && npm-run-all build:* && rm ./build/manifest.* && cp ./public/manifest.chrome.json ./build/manifest.json
scripts.buildDev: npm-run-all buildUnix:* && npm-run-all build:* && rm ./build/manifest.* && cp ./public/manifest.chrome.dev.json ./build/manifest.json
scripts.buildWindows:popup: SET INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false && SET DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true && react-scripts build
scripts.buildFirefox: npm-run-all buildUnix:* && npm-run-all build:* && rm ./build/manifest.* && cp ./public/manifest.firefox.json ./build/manifest.json
scripts.buildFirefoxDev: npm-run-all buildUnix:* && npm-run-all build:* && rm ./build/manifest.* && cp ./public/manifest.firefox.dev.json ./build/manifest.json
scripts.pub-ci: (cd src && git clone -b development https://github.com/zeeguu-ecosystem/zeeguu-react.git && cd zeeguu-react && npm ci) && cp ./public/manifest.chrome.json ./build/manifest.json && npm-run-all build:* && zip -FSr build.zip build
scripts.pub-ci-firefox: (cd src && git clone -b development https://github.com/zeeguu-ecosystem/zeeguu-react.git && cd zeeguu-react && npm ci) && npm run buildFirefox && zip -FSr build.zip build
scripts.buildZipChrome: npm run build && npm run zip-build
scripts.buildZipFirefox: npm run buildFirefox && npm run zip-build
